extDescription.message: Browser extension for tldw_server - your unified AI assistant with RAG, media processing, and more.

learnMoreTldw.message: 了解 tldw 伺服器的運作方式

contextSaveToNotesNoSelection.message: Select text first to save to Notes.

contextSaveToNotesDeliveryFailed.message: Could not open the sidebar to save this note. Check that the tldw Assistant sidebar is allowed on this site and try again.

hfSendPageRejected.message: [tldw] Page send request rejected by tldw_server

hfSendPageErrorWithDetail.message: [tldw] Failed to send this page to tldw_server: $1. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfSendPageError.message: [tldw] Failed to send this page to tldw_server. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfSendPageSuccess.message: [tldw] Sent page to tldw_server for processing

hfSendPageException.message: [tldw] Something went wrong while sending this page to tldw_server. Check that your tldw_server and the extension are running, then try again.

hfPullInProgress.message: [tldw Assistant] A model pull request is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before starting another one.

hfPullConfirm.message: [tldw Assistant] Do you want to send a request to your tldw_server to pull the "$1" model? This is independent of the huggingface.co website. Your server will start pulling the model after you confirm.

hfPullSending.message: [tldw Assistant] Sending a request to your tldw_server to pull "$1". Check the extension icon or your tldw_server logs for progress.

hfPullErrorWithDetail.message: [tldw Assistant] Failed to send a pull request for "$1": $2. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfPullError.message: [tldw Assistant] Failed to send a pull request for "$1". Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfPullSuccess.message: [tldw Assistant] Request sent to your tldw_server to pull "$1". Monitor the extension icon or tldw_server logs for status.

hfPullException.message: [tldw Assistant] Something went wrong while sending a pull request for "$1" to your tldw_server. Check that your tldw_server and the extension are running, then try again.

footerHelp.message: 連線完成後，你可以隨時從擴充功能選單回到這些設定。

authModeHelp.message: Single User（API Key）適合個人或小型團隊的伺服器。Multi User（Login）適用於多人共用的部署，使用者以帳號或 SSO 登入。請選擇符合你 tldw_server 設定方式的模式。

apiKeyHelp.message: 在 tldw_server → Settings → API Keys 中可以找到你的 API 金鑰。在那裡產生金鑰後，將其貼到這裡。

confirmStepAria.message: 步驟 3 / 3 — 連線摘要與後續步驟

notesEmpty_connectDescription.message: 若要使用「筆記」，請先連線到你的 tldw 伺服器。

notesEmpty_connectExample1.message: 開啟「設定」→「tldw server」，新增你的伺服器 URL。

notesEmpty_connectExample2.message: 若伺服器正在執行但無法連線，請使用「診斷」。

notesEmpty_demoTitle.message: 在示範模式中探索筆記

notesEmpty_demoDescription.message: 此示範會說明「筆記」如何整理你的洞見。之後你可以連線自己的伺服器，建立並儲存真正的筆記。

notesEmpty_demoExample1.message: 看看在清單中，筆記標題、預覽與時間戳記是如何顯示的。

notesEmpty_demoExample2.message: 完成連線後，你可以從會議、複閱結果等內容建立筆記。

notesEmpty_demoExample3.message: 將「筆記」搭配「媒體」與「複閱」一起使用，幫助你整理並追蹤重要的發現。

notesEmpty_demoSample1Title.message: 示範筆記：每週會議摘要

notesEmpty_demoSample1Preview.message: 最近團隊同步中的決策、阻礙與後續追蹤事項。

notesEmpty_demoSample2Preview.message: 從長篇文章或論文中整理出的關鍵洞見。

notesEmpty_demoSample3Preview.message: 客戶通話的重點整理，以及下一步行動與負責人。

notesEmpty_description.message: 建立並整理與 tldw 洞見相關的自由格式筆記。

notesEmpty_exampleCreate.message: 為最近的一場會議或逐字稿建立一則新的筆記。

notesEmpty_exampleLink.message: 將複閱產出儲存到「筆記」，方便日後回顧。

restartOnboardingLabel.message: 從頭重新開始引導設定

restartOnboardingConfirmMessage.message: 這會重設你的引導狀態，並將你帶回設定流程的起始步驟。

error_friendlyApiKeySummary.message: 無法連線到您的 tldw 伺服器。

error_friendlyTimeoutHint.message: 伺服器停止串流回應。請重試，或開啟 Health & diagnostics 查看伺服器狀態。

error_friendlyGenericSummary.message: 與您的 tldw 伺服器通訊時發生問題。

error_friendlyGenericHint.message: 請稍後再試，或開啟 Health & diagnostics 檢查伺服器狀態。

contentReview_emptyDescription.message: 目前尚無草稿。使用 Quick Ingest 並啟用「儲存前審查」即可建立草稿。

contentReview_reviewBeforeStorageHint.message: 先處理，然後在提交到伺服器前於本機編輯草稿。

contentReview_reviewWarningTitle.message: 要將草稿儲存在本機嗎？

contentReview_reviewWarningBody.message: 草稿會儲存在此瀏覽器中，可能包含敏感資料。你可隨時在「內容審核」頁面清除草稿。

contentReview_reviewWarningBodySecondary.message: 審核模式會在提交到伺服器前把內容保留在用戶端。

contentReview_reviewStorageCapWarning_on.message: {{count}} 個檔案超過本機草稿上限（{{cap}}）。請在提交音訊/影片前附加來源。

contentReview_reviewStorageCapWarning_ot.message: {{count}} 個檔案超過本機草稿上限（{{cap}}）。請在提交音訊/影片前附加來源。

contentReview_selectDraft.message: 選取一個草稿開始審查。

contentReview_resetBody.message: 這會還原此草稿的原始內容。

contentReview_aiHint.message: 會將草稿內容傳送至伺服器，由 AI 進行處理。

contentReview_aiConsentBody.message: 這會將草稿內容傳送到你的 tldw 伺服器進行 AI 處理。在你提交之前，草稿都只會保留在本機。

contentReview_aiUnavailable.message: 聊天補全功能目前無法使用。

contentReview_detectSectionsBody.message: 這會取代既有段落並重設你的選取項目。

contentReview_templates_transcript_clean.message: 在保留行結構的前提下，統一標點符號與大小寫。

contentReview_templates_speaker_turns_de.message: 確保每位說話者的輪次各自位於一行，並帶有清楚的標籤。

contentReview_templates_chapter_headings.message: 插入 Markdown 標題來分組主題，而不移除任何內容。

contentReview_missingSourceBody.message: 請附加原始檔案後再提交此草稿。

contentReview_commitDisabled.message: 提交前請先附加原始的音訊／視訊檔案。

contentReview_discardBody.message: 此草稿會被標記為已捨棄，並從審查清單中移除。

contentReview_commitAllTitle.message: 提交所有已審查的草稿？

contentReview_clearBody.message: 這會移除所有本機內容審查草稿與相關資源。

playground_tldwState_missingHelp.message: Open Settings → tldw Server to add your URL or connect to the Options page.

playground_tldwState_troubleshoot.message: Confirm your server is running and that the browser is allowed to reach it, then retry from the Options page.

playground_errors_privateModeDescription.message: Firefox 隱私模式不支援儲存聊天。暫存聊天預設為開啟。後續會改進。

playground_tts_browserInfoTitle.message: 瀏覽器 TTS 使用系統音訊

playground_tts_browserInfoDescription.message: Browser TTS plays using your system synthesizer and does not expose a downloadable audio file. Use the segment controls below, or switch providers for a track list and player.

playground_tts_unsupportedProviderTitle.message: 不支援的 TTS 提供者

playground_tts_unsupportedProviderDescri.message: 提供者「{{provider}}」尚未在 Playground 播放器中支援。

playground_tts_elevenLabsMissingBody.message: Add your ElevenLabs API key in Settings to load voices and models.

playground_tts_elevenLabsUnavailableBody.message: We couldn't load voices or models. Check your API key and try again.

playground_tts_generateErrorDescription.message: 產生 TTS 音訊時發生問題。

playground_tts_playHelper.message: Play uses your selected provider, voice, and speed.

playground_tts_playDisabledTtsOff.message: Enable text-to-speech above to play audio.

playground_tts_playDisabledElevenLabs.message: Add an ElevenLabs API key, voice, and model to enable Play.

playground_tts_providerChangeHelper.message: Open the provider selector below to switch between Browser, tldw, OpenAI, or Supersonic.

playground_tts_subtitle.message: Try out text-to-speech and tweak providers, models, and voices.

playground_tts_settingsIntro.message: Adjust your TTS provider, model, and voice. These settings are reused when you play audio from chat or media.

playground_tts_inputLabel.message: Enter some text to hear it spoken.

playground_tts_inputPlaceholder.message: Type or paste text here, then use Play to listen.

playground_tts_browserSegmentsHelp.message: Queue segments or play an individual segment using system audio.

playground_tts_tldwStatusOffline.message: Audio API not detected; check your tldw server version.

playground_tts_tldwWarningBody.message: Ensure your tldw_server version includes /api/v1/audio/speech and that your extension is connected with a valid API key.

playground_tts_speechErrorBody.message: Transcription request failed. Check tldw server health.

playground_tts_speechNoText.message: The transcription did not return any text.

playground_tts_speechMicError.message: Unable to access your microphone. Check browser permissions and try again.

playground_empty_description.message: Experiment with different models, prompts, and knowledge sources here.

playground_empty_demoDescription.message: You’re in demo mode — try asking a question to see how the assistant responds. You can connect your own tldw server later.

playground_empty_example1.message: Ask a question, then drag in documents or web pages you want to discuss.

playground_empty_example2.message: Use Quick ingest to add transcripts or notes, then reference them in chat.

playground_empty_example3.message: Try different prompts or models from the header to compare answers.

playground_drop_hint.message: Drop files to attach them to your message

playground_drop_unsupported.message: That file type isn’t supported. Try images or text-based files.

playground_drop_imageOnly.message: Only images can be dropped here right now.

playground_drop_imageHint.message: Drop an image to include it in your message

playground_drop_overlayInstruction.message: Drop the image to attach it to your next reply

playground_stt_subtitle.message: Try out transcription models, run longer dictation sessions, and save transcripts into Notes.

playground_stt_settingsNotice.message: Language, task, response format, segmentation, and prompt reuse your Speech-to-Text defaults from Settings.

playground_stt_emptyHistory.message: Start a recording to see transcripts here. You can save any item into Notes.

playground_stt_currentTranscriptPlacehol.message: Live transcript will appear here while recording.

playground_actions_ingestDisabled.message: Connect to your tldw server to ingest.

playground_actions_ingestHint.message: Upload URLs or files with advanced options.

playground_composer_queuedBanner_body.message: We’ll hold these messages and send them once your tldw server is connected.

playground_composer_connectionPlaceholde.message: Connect to your tldw server in Settings to send messages and view media.

playground_composer_connectNotice.message: Connect to your tldw server in Settings to send messages and view media.

playground_composer_contextMediaHint.message: Attach Media & Notes that should steer the response.

playground_composer_contextTabsHint.message: Review or remove referenced tabs, or add more from your open browser tabs.

playground_composer_persistence_ephemera.message: Not saved in history; clears when you close this tab.

playground_composer_persistence_saveToSe.message: Also save this chat to server

playground_composer_persistence_connectT.message: Connect your server to save chats there.

playground_composer_persistence_serverSa.message: Future messages in this chat will sync to your tldw server.

playground_composer_persistence_serverCh.message: Unable to find or create a default assistant character on the server. Try again from the Characters page.

playground_composer_connectToSend.message: 在「設定」中連線到你的 tldw 伺服器以發送訊息並查看媒體。

playground_composer_compareSettingsToggl.message: 將你的下一則訊息傳送給多個模型。

playground_composer_compareNoneSelected.message: 尚未選擇要比較的模型

playground_composer_compareActiveModelsH.message: 你的下一則訊息將傳送給每個已啟用的模型。

playground_composer_compareMaxModels.message: 每次最多可比較 {{limit}} 個模型。

playground_composer_compareMaxModelsTrim.message: 每次比較限制為 {{limit}} 個模型。使用前 {{limit}} 個選定的模型。

playground_composer_compareContinueHint.message: 使用選定的模型繼續此聊天。

playground_composer_validationCompareSel.message: 請至少選擇一個模型以使用比較模式。

manageCharacters_tags_help.message: 使用標籤依用途分類角色（例如「寫作」、「教學」）。

manageCharacters_confirm_delete.message: 確定要刪除這個角色嗎？此動作無法復原。

manageCharacters_avatar_formatError.message: 僅支援 PNG、JPEG 和 GIF 圖片

manageCharacters_avatar_dropzone.message: 點擊或拖曳圖片以進行上傳

manageCharacters_form_description.message: 定義可重複使用的角色，可在側邊欄與其聊天。

manageCharacters_form_systemPrompt_place.message: 例如：你是一位有耐心的數學老師，循序解說並用短例子確認理解。

manageCharacters_form_systemPrompt_help.message: 說明角色的定位、語氣與限制。例如：「你是一位有耐心的數學家教，會一步步解釋概念。」

manageCharacters_form_systemPrompt_requi.message: 請新增指示以引導回應。

manageCharacters_form_systemPrompt_min.message: 添加簡短描述，讓角色知道如何回應。

manageCharacters_form_systemPrompt_max.message: 系統提示詞必須少於或等於 2000 個字元。

manageCharacters_form_greeting_placehold.message: 嗨！我是你的寫作教練。貼上草稿，我會幫你潤飾。

manageCharacters_form_greeting_help.message: 開始聊天時角色會傳送的第一則訊息（可選）。

manageCharacters_emptyDescription.message: 建立具備名稱、描述與系統提示的可重複使用角色，方便聊天。

manageCharacters_emptyExample1.message: 定義可重複使用的寫作教練、背景專家或程式助理。

manageCharacters_emptyExample2.message: 為每個角色提供清楚的描述與行為，使回應保持一致。

quiz_answerAll.message: 提交前請回答所有題目。
